p: In the year 2016 incidence of dengue began by September and peaked during October and sharply decreased by subsequent months. In the year 2017 the incidence of dengue started by May and abruptly rises till the month of August and declining from the month of September onwards. In 2018 the incidence of dengue were seen sparsely distributed throughout the year except in the month of February, May and June with no incidence of dengue ( Fig. 1, Table 2).
